original_text: The third river is called the Tigris. It goes along the east side of Assyria. The fourth river is called the Euphrates.
korean_text: 셋째 강의 이름은 힛데겔이라 앗수르 동쪽으로 흘렀으며 넷째 강은 유브라데더라

sentences.original_text: The third river is called the Tigris
sentences.korean_translation: 세 번째 강은 티그리스 강이라고 불립니다

sentences.original_text: It goes along the east side of Assyria
The fourth river is called the Euphrates
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 강은 유프라테스 강이라고 불립니다
